titles.title: Waiving points of order against the conference report to accompany the bill (H.R. 4) to restore the American family, reduce illegitimacy, control welfare spending and reduce welfare dependence.

action.text: The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 104-431, by Mr. Solomon.

calendar.text: Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 170.

action.text: Rule provides for consideration of the conference report to H.R. 4. Waiving all points of order against the conference report and against its consideration. The conference report shall be considered as read.
DEBATE - The House proceeded with one hour of debate.
The previous question was ordered without objection.

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: 12/21/1995--Introduced. Waives points of order against the consideration of the conference report on H.R. 4 (welfare programs).
